name: yoncode/database
description: The Illuminate Database modified package to works with Silex application and PHP 5.3.

suggest.doctrine/dbal: Required to rename columns and drop SQLite columns (~2.4).
suggest.fzaninotto/faker: Required to use the eloquent factory builder (~1.4).
suggest.illuminate/console: Required to use the database commands (5.3.*).
suggest.illuminate/events: Required to use the observers with Eloquent (5.3.*).
suggest.illuminate/pagination: Required to paginate the result set (5.3.*).
